Revenue Models

Zobject Types

Zobjects

GeoIP

Zobjects Collection

List all Zobjects

GET - https://api.zype.com/zobject/?zobject_type=zobject_type&page=page&per_page=per_page&keywords=keyword

Parameters

Parameter Function Type
zobject_type The title of the zobject type. Required. Example: cards. String
page The page number of records to return (zero indexed). Example: 0. Number
per_page The number of records to return. Example: 10. Number
keywords Filters the records returned by keyword. Example: comedy. String

Response

200 Content-Type: application/json

{
    response : [
        "_id": "542b182c69702d73796d1100",
        "active": true,
        "alternate_name": "-",
        "attack": 1500,
        "created_at": "2014-09-30T20:53:00.926Z",
        "defense": 800,
        "description": null,
        "featured": false,
        "friendly_name": "blackland-fire-dragon",
        "friendly_title": "blackland-fire-dragon",
        "keywords": [],
        "level": "4",
        "rank": "-",
        "site_id": "12345abcde",
        "sort_order": 0,
        "tgc_link": "http://www.db.yugioh-card.com/yugiohdb/card_search.action?ope=2&cid=4016",
        "title": "Blackland Fire Dragon",
        "title_jp": "暗黒の竜王",
        "tv_only": false,
        "updated_at": "2014-09-30T20:53:00.926Z",
        "video_ids": [],
        "zobject_type_id": "53a4788c69702d5995630300",
        "zobject_type_title": "card"
    ]
}

Create a Zobject

POST - https://api.zype.com/zobjects?page=page&per_page=per_page&keywords=keyword

Parameters

Parameter Function Type
zobject A set of key value pairs that describe the Zobject. Hash

Request

Content-Type: application/json

Response

201 Content-Type: application/json

{
    response: {
        "_id": "542b182c69702d73796d1100",
        "active": true,
        "alternate_name": "-",
        "attack": 1500,
        "created_at": "2014-09-30T20:53:00.926Z",
        "defense": 800,
        "description": null,
        "featured": false,
        "friendly_name": "blackland-fire-dragon",
        "friendly_title": "blackland-fire-dragon",
        "keywords": [],
        "level": "4",
        "rank": "-",
        "site_id": "12345abcde",
        "sort_order": 0,
        "tgc_link": "http://www.db.yugioh-card.com/yugiohdb/card_search.action?ope=2&cid=4016",
        "title": "Blackland Fire Dragon",
        "title_jp": "暗黒の竜王",
        "tv_only": false,
        "updated_at": "2014-09-30T20:53:00.926Z",
        "video_ids": [],
        "zobject_type_id": "53a4788c69702d5995630300",
        "zobject_type_title": "card"
    }, ...
}

Zobject

Lists descriptive information about Zobjects.

Zobject

GET - https://api.zype.com/zobjects/{id}/?zobject_type=zobject_type

Parameters

Parameter Function Type
id String id of the zobject to retrieve. Example: 5389352e69702d401b000000. Number
zobject_type The title of the zobject type. Required. Example: String

Response

200 Content-Type: application/json

{
    response :
        {
          "_id": "542b182c69702d73796d1100",
          "active": true,
          "alternate_name": "-",
          "attack": 1500,
          "created_at": "2014-09-30T20:53:00.926Z",
          "defense": 800,
          "description": null,
          "featured": false,
          "friendly_name": "blackland-fire-dragon",
          "friendly_title": "blackland-fire-dragon",
          "keywords": [],
          "level": "4",
          "rank": "-",
          "site_id": "12345abcde",
          "sort_order": 0,
          "tgc_link": "http://www.db.yugioh-card.com/yugiohdb/card_search.action?ope=2&cid=4016",
          "title": "Blackland Fire Dragon",
          "title_jp": "暗黒の竜王",
          "tv_only": false,
          "updated_at": "2014-09-30T20:53:00.926Z",
          "video_ids": [],
          "zobject_type_id": "53a4788c69702d5995630300",
          "zobject_type_title": "card"
        }
}

Update a Zobject

PUT - https://api.zype.com/zobjects/{id}

Parameters

Parameter Function Type
zobject A set of key value pairs that describe the zobject. Hash

Request

Content-Type: application/json

Response

201 Content-Type: application/json

{
    response :
      {
        "_id": "542b182c69702d73796d1100",
        "active": true,
        "alternate_name": "-",
        "attack": 1500,
        "created_at": "2014-09-30T20:53:00.926Z",
        "defense": 800,
        "description": null,
        "featured": false,
        "friendly_name": "blackland-fire-dragon",
        "friendly_title": "blackland-fire-dragon",
        "keywords": [],
        "level": "4",
        "rank": "-",
        "site_id": "12345abcde",
        "sort_order": 0,
        "tgc_link": "http://www.db.yugioh-card.com/yugiohdb/card_search.action?ope=2&cid=4016",
        "title": "Blackland Fire Dragon",
        "title_jp": "暗黒の竜王",
        "tv_only": false,
        "updated_at": "2014-09-30T20:53:00.926Z",
        "video_ids": [],
        "zobject_type_id": "53a4788c69702d5995630300",
        "zobject_type_title": "card"
      }
}

Remove a Zobject

DELETE - https://api.zype.com/zobjects/{id}/?zobject_type=zobject_type

Parameters

Parameter Function Type
id String id of the zobject to remove. Example: 5389352e69702d401b000000. Number
zobject_type The title of the zobject type. Required. Example: cards. String

Response

200 Content-Type: application/json

{
    response :
        {
          "_id": "542b182c69702d73796d1100",
          "active": true,
          "alternate_name": "-",
          "attack": 1500,
          "created_at": "2014-09-30T20:53:00.926Z",
          "defense": 800,
          "description": null,
          "featured": false,
          "friendly_name": "blackland-fire-dragon",
          "friendly_title": "blackland-fire-dragon",
          "keywords": [],
          "level": "4",
          "rank": "-",
          "site_id": "12345abcde",
          "sort_order": 0,
          "tgc_link": "http://www.db.yugioh-card.com/yugiohdb/card_search.action?ope=2&cid=4016",
          "title": "Blackland Fire Dragon",
          "title_jp": "暗黒の竜王",
          "tv_only": false,
          "updated_at": "2014-09-30T20:53:00.926Z",
          "video_ids": [],
          "zobject_type_id": "53a4788c69702d5995630300",
          "zobject_type_title": "card"
        }
}
